htmlContent:
Cancels/prevents Willy Brandt.

Add 3 US Influence in East Germany.

Then US may make a free Coup attempt or Realignment rolls in Europe using this card’s Ops Value.
name: Tear Down This Wall*
plainContent:
Cancels/prevents Willy Brandt.
Add 3 US Influence in East Germany.
Then US may make a free Coup attempt or Realignment rolls in Europe using this card’s Ops Value.
